name: 黃宏裕
objective:
本課程內容分二部分進行授課，第一個部份以小組進行設計練習，繪製平、立、剖面圖，使學生感受實體與練習之關係；由於目前臺灣多以集合住宅建照申請居多，且住宅為空間尺度之根本；因此，第二個部份之課堂操作，依序為浴廁、臥室、廚房、餐廳、客廳單元等不同空間尺度練習後，聚焦於住宅平面圖之練習；接著，透過住宅平面圖之練習，衍伸至立面圖與剖面圖與 3D 透視圖練習。課程亦將藉由同學上述二個部分之練習，延續第一學期建築製圖基本常識、觀念與技法之傳授，以確實增進學生建築製圖能力。 本課程符合系教育目標如下： 1. 訓練學生建築設計與工程基礎專業能力； 2. 透過實作方式彙整建築設計與建築構造之技能； 3. 引導建立建築專業道德倫理態度。
This course will need the knowledge from the previous course Architectural Graphics (1) and apply them into graphics; The course have two parts, first part of the course will split the class into small groups ,students will first measuring the school buildings and than draw them into three-dimensional diagrams. Second, lecture the detail graphics of residential building such as the floor plan, bathroom, bedroom, kitchen etc. and more drawing practice on cross section graphics and elevation graphics. During the semester Introduction to graphics will enable the students ready for second semester. After this course the students will acquire the following aspects: 1). Advance knowledge in architectural design and engineering. 2). Practical skill in architectural design and structure. 3). Correct attitude in architectural professions moral.
